com.functions

Class RoomFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.functions.RoomFunction

  • public class RoomFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    RoomFunction class contains all functions needed to Chambre Object
    This class contains 9 public functions and 20 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> bookedRoomList
      ArrayList<Chambre> bookedRoomList stores Chambre object for which a room has been booked
      static java.util.ArrayList<Examen> temporaryListExamination
      ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListExamination stores Examen to display in JList switchRoomAndExaminationList
      static java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListNoBooking
      ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListNoBooking stores Chambre object with no bookingRoom
      static java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListRoom
      ArrayList<Chambre> temporaryListRoom stores Chambre object after filters have been used

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void bookingAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JList bookedRoomList, javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton)
      this function is used to instantiate a Chambre Object from the choices of the user
      First The extractExaminationFromList is used and an Examen is created If withoutRoomRButton is not selected, the extractRoomFromArray is used and a Chambre is identified Then all the field are checked Several functions are used to update the several List and Array before updating the values of the selected Chambre and Examen temporaryListRoom must be cleared before quitting the function
      private static void bookingRoom(Examen examination, Chambre room, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
      This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The values writen by the user are registered in the specific Chambre Object The values of the Examen object related to this booking are updated
      static void cancelDataBeforeBookingRoom(javax.swing.JList list, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup, javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup, javax.swing.JComboBox lengthOfStayTypeSelection, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
      this function is used to clear the fields related of a Chambre information in the application
      All the fields are cleared and no informations remains
      private static void clearInformationOnPannel(javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup)
      this function is used to clear the fields related of a Chambre information in the application
      All the fields are cleared and no informations remains
      static void creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      This function is needed when the Application is started for the first time It creates Chambre objects whose are stored in arrayRoom Then those Chambre Objects are saved in a txt file
      private static void defaultDataLongStayAlone(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      This function can only be used through resetRoomDataToDefault
      private static void defaultDataLongStaytAccompanying(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      This function can only be used through resetRoomDataToDefault

      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object

      private static void defaultDataShorStaytAccompanying(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      This function can only be used through resetRoomDataToDefault
      static void deleteBookedRoom(javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, javax.swing.JList bookedList, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to delete the booking of a Chambre Object
      If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Else a Chambre Object is instantiate with the informations stores in the bookedRoomList at the specific index Several functions are used to reset all the informations related to the Examen and the Chambre objects
      private static void deleteDataFromExamination()
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Examen object A loop is used to check the parameter of each Examen object stored in temporaryListExamination If the Examen is found its bookingRoom value is update to false and the loop is broken
      private static void deleteDataFromExamination(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Examen object
      private static Examen extractExaminationFromList(javax.swing.JList list)
      this function is used to extract an Examen from temporaryListExamination
      A loop is used to check for each Examen the status of the boolean isBookingRoom (parameter of Examen) The loop is broken avec the first occurence of the boolean with a true value
      private static Chambre extractRoomFromArray(javax.swing.JList list)
      this function is used to extract a Chambre from temporaryListRoom
      If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom
      private static void filterRoomWithSelection(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton)
      this function is used to filter the available Chambre object with the informations selected by the user
      The function used is related to the state of the withAccompangyingRButton and LengthOfStaySelectionBox If withAccompangyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withAccompangyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStayAlone() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStayAlone() is put in action
      private static void noBookingRoom(javax.swing.JList list, Examen examination, Chambre room)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
      This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The Parameter bookingRoom of the specific Examen is updated A Chambre object is instantiate with specific values The Examen update its Chambre parameter Object with those new informations
      private static void printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to show only the booked Chambre information in the specific JList
      At the beginning of this function the bookedRoomList must be cleared A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom If the parameter examination of the Chambre is not null The Chambre is store in bookedRoomList Finally the Chambre stored in bookedRoomList are shown through the JList
      static void printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list, Chambre room)
      this function is used to remove the booked Chambre from bookedRoomList
      A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom When the specific Chambre object is found, it is removed from the bookedRoomList Finally the bookedRoomList updated is shown through the JList
      static void resetRoomDataToDefault(Chambre room)
      This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Chambre object
      One of the following funtions is used if it matches the parameters of the Chambre object
      private static void selectRoomLongStayAlone(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void selectRoomShorStayAlone(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
      This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
      private static void showInformationFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField)
      this function is used to dispatch the information of an Examen from arrayExamination in the related fields
      This function can only be used through showInformationRoomAndExamination() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Then the Examen is extracted from the temporaryListExamination and the id of the Patient Object is displayed in the specific field
      private static void showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom(javax.swing.JList list, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
      this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
      This function can only be used through showInformationRoomAndExamination() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Then if temporaryListRoom is empty the Chambre is extracted from the arrayRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field Else the Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field
      static void showInformationRoomAndExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
      this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
      The function used is related to the state of the temporaryListRoom if the temporaryListRoom is empty showInformationFromArrayExamination() if put in action else showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom() is used
      static void updadeExaminationListForBooking(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination)
      this function is used to update the temporaryListExamination
      At the beginning of this function the temporaryListExamination must be cleared A loop is used to check all the Examen Object stored in arrayExamination If the parameter booking of the Examen is put to false Then Examen is add to the temporaryListExamination Finally the temporaryListExamination updated is shown through the JList
      static void updateListOfAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton, javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
      this function is used to select the Chambre Object available from the choices of the user
      before the selection of the Chambre is done all the field are check If the result of the selected index equals -1 the isn't executed If withoutRoomRButton is selected, the Examination is updated and the function ends Else the other fields are checked , the Examination is updated The default range for the entry and realese date are updated Finally filterRoomWithSelection() is used
      private static void updateRoomInformation(javax.swing.JList list, Examen examination, Chambre room, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField, javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton)
      this function is used to update the information of a Chambre object
      The function used is related to the state of the withoutRoomRButton if the withoutRoomRButton is selected noBookingRoom() is put in action else bookingRoom() is used

      • creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty

        public static void creatRoomIfFileIsEmpty(java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        This function is needed when the Application is started for the first time It creates Chambre objects whose are stored in arrayRoom Then those Chambre Objects are saved in a txt file
        Parameters:
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        See Also:
        Chambre.Chambre(String, String, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, int, boolean), WriteInExternalFiles.writeRoomFile(ArrayList)

      • updateListOfAvailableRoom

        public static void updateListOfAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                             javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField,
                                             javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton,
                                             javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton,
                                             javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton,
                                             javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton,
                                             javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox,
                                             com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                             com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
        this function is used to select the Chambre Object available from the choices of the user
        before the selection of the Chambre is done all the field are check If the result of the selected index equals -1 the isn't executed If withoutRoomRButton is selected, the Examination is updated and the function ends Else the other fields are checked , the Examination is updated The default range for the entry and realese date are updated Finally filterRoomWithSelection() is used
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        withRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        See Also:
        RoomControler.inputFieldControlerBookingRoomRButton(JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JTextField), RoomControler.inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomSelection(JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JRadioButton, JComboBox), DefaultValueLuncher.setDefaultRangeForBookingRoomDate(JDateChooser, JDateChooser, Examen), filterRoomWithSelection(JList, ArrayList, JComboBox, JRadioButton, JRadioButton)

      • bookingAvailableRoom

        public static void bookingAvailableRoom(javax.swing.JList list,
                                        com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                        com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                        javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                        javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField,
                                        javax.swing.JRadioButton withRoomRButton,
                                        javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup,
                                        javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox,
                                        javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                        javax.swing.JList bookedRoomList,
                                        javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup,
                                        javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton,
                                        javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompangyingRButton)
        this function is used to instantiate a Chambre Object from the choices of the user
        First The extractExaminationFromList is used and an Examen is created If withoutRoomRButton is not selected, the extractRoomFromArray is used and a Chambre is identified Then all the field are checked Several functions are used to update the several List and Array before updating the values of the selected Chambre and Examen temporaryListRoom must be cleared before quitting the function
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        withoutRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        withRoomRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        accompanyingGroup - : store the selection result of a JRadioButton group with boolean type
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        bookedRoomList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object
        bookingGroup - : store the selection result of a JRadioButton group with boolean type
        withAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        See Also:
        extractExaminationFromList(JList), extractRoomFromArray(JList), RoomControler.inputFieldControlerGlobalCheckUp(JRadioButton,JRadioButton,JTextField,JRadioButton,JRadioButton,JComboBox,JDateChooser,JDateChooser,JTextField), RoomControler.inputFieldControlerBeforeRoomBooking(JDateChooser, JDateChooser, JTextField), updateRoomInformation(JList, Examen, Chambre, JDateChooser, JDateChooser, JRadioButton), updadeExaminationListForBooking(JList, ArrayList), clearInformationOnPannel(JTextField, ButtonGroup, JComboBox, JDateChooser, JDateChooser, JTextField, ButtonGroup), printRoomInList(JList, ArrayList)

      • showInformationRoomAndExamination

        public static void showInformationRoomAndExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                     javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField,
                                                     javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField)
        this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
        The function used is related to the state of the temporaryListRoom if the temporaryListRoom is empty showInformationFromArrayExamination() if put in action else showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom() is used
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        See Also:

      • deleteBookedRoom

        public static void deleteBookedRoom(javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                    javax.swing.JList bookedList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to delete the booking of a Chambre Object
        If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Else a Chambre Object is instantiate with the informations stores in the bookedRoomList at the specific index Several functions are used to reset all the informations related to the Examen and the Chambre objects

      • updateRoomInformation

        private static void updateRoomInformation(javax.swing.JList list,
                                          Examen examination,
                                          Chambre room,
                                          com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                          com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                          javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutRoomRButton)
        this function is used to update the information of a Chambre object
        The function used is related to the state of the withoutRoomRButton if the withoutRoomRButton is selected noBookingRoom() is put in action else bookingRoom() is used

      • filterRoomWithSelection

        private static void filterRoomWithSelection(javax.swing.JList list,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom,
                                            javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox,
                                            javax.swing.JRadioButton withAccompangyingRButton,
                                            javax.swing.JRadioButton withoutAccompanyingRButton)
        this function is used to filter the available Chambre object with the informations selected by the user
        The function used is related to the state of the withAccompangyingRButton and LengthOfStaySelectionBox If withAccompangyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withAccompangyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the first index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomShorStayAlone() is put in action Else if withoutAccompanyingRButton and the Second index of LengthOfStaySelectionBox are selected selectRoomLongStayAlone() is put in action
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        withAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        withoutAccompangyingRButton - : Radio Button if selected return true
        See Also:
        selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying(JList, ArrayList), selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying(JList, ArrayList), selectRoomShorStayAlone(JList, ArrayList), selectRoomLongStayAlone(JList, ArrayList)

      • selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying

        private static void selectRoomShorStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
        This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        See Also:
        filterRoomWithSelection(JList, ArrayList, JComboBox, JRadioButton, JRadioButton)

      • selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying

        private static void selectRoomLongStaytAccompanying(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
        This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        See Also:
        filterRoomWithSelection(JList, ArrayList, JComboBox, JRadioButton, JRadioButton)

      • selectRoomShorStayAlone

        private static void selectRoomShorStayAlone(javax.swing.JList list,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to reduce the number of available Chambre with the choices of the user
        This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        See Also:
        filterRoomWithSelection(JList, ArrayList, JComboBox, JRadioButton, JRadioButton)

        This function can only be used through filterRoomWithSelection() TemporaryListRoom must be cleared at the beginning of this function In a loop all the available Chambre objects are checked All Chambre Object matching the choices of the user are add to TemporaryListRoom Then they are shown through the JList

      • showInformationFromArrayExamination

        private static void showInformationFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                        javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField)
        this function is used to dispatch the information of an Examen from arrayExamination in the related fields
        This function can only be used through showInformationRoomAndExamination() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Then the Examen is extracted from the temporaryListExamination and the id of the Patient Object is displayed in the specific field
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        See Also:
        showInformationRoomAndExamination(JList, ArrayList, ArrayList, JTextField, JTextField)

      • showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom

        private static void showInformationFromTemporaryListRoom(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                         javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to dispatch the information of a Chambre object in the related fields
        This function can only be used through showInformationRoomAndExamination() If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Then if temporaryListRoom is empty the Chambre is extracted from the arrayRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field Else the Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom and the room number is displayed in the specific field
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user
        See Also:
        showInformationRoomAndExamination(JList, ArrayList, ArrayList, JTextField, JTextField)

      • extractExaminationFromList

        private static Examen extractExaminationFromList(javax.swing.JList list)
        this function is used to extract an Examen from temporaryListExamination
        A loop is used to check for each Examen the status of the boolean isBookingRoom (parameter of Examen) The loop is broken avec the first occurence of the boolean with a true value
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        Returns:
        an Examen Object
        See Also:

      • extractRoomFromArray

        private static Chambre extractRoomFromArray(javax.swing.JList list)
        this function is used to extract a Chambre from temporaryListRoom
        If the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Chambre is extracted from the temporaryListRoom
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        Returns:
        a Chambre Object

      • noBookingRoom

        private static void noBookingRoom(javax.swing.JList list,
                                  Examen examination,
                                  Chambre room)
        this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
        This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The Parameter bookingRoom of the specific Examen is updated A Chambre object is instantiate with specific values The Examen update its Chambre parameter Object with those new informations
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        examination - : a specific Examen Object
        room - : a specific Chambre Object
        See Also:
        updateRoomInformation(JList, Examen, Chambre, JDateChooser, JDateChooser, JRadioButton)

      • bookingRoom

        private static void bookingRoom(Examen examination,
                                Chambre room,
                                com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField)
        this function is used to update the information of a Chambre and Examen object
        This function can only be used through updateRoomInformation The values writen by the user are registered in the specific Chambre Object The values of the Examen object related to this booking are updated
        Parameters:
        examination - : a specific Examen Object
        room - : a specific Chambre Object
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        See Also:
        updateRoomInformation(JList, Examen, Chambre, JDateChooser, JDateChooser, JRadioButton), ParseFunctions.dateFormating(JDateChooser)

      • updadeExaminationListForBooking

        public static void updadeExaminationListForBooking(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                   java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination)
        this function is used to update the temporaryListExamination
        At the beginning of this function the temporaryListExamination must be cleared A loop is used to check all the Examen Object stored in arrayExamination If the parameter booking of the Examen is put to false Then Examen is add to the temporaryListExamination Finally the temporaryListExamination updated is shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : switch between temporaryListExamination informations and temporaryListRoom
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user

      • clearInformationOnPannel

        private static void clearInformationOnPannel(javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField,
                                             javax.swing.ButtonGroup accompanyingGroup,
                                             javax.swing.JComboBox LengthOfStaySelectionBox,
                                             com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser entryDateField,
                                             com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser releaseDateField,
                                             javax.swing.JTextField bedRoomNumberField,
                                             javax.swing.ButtonGroup bookingGroup)
        this function is used to clear the fields related of a Chambre information in the application
        All the fields are cleared and no informations remains
        Parameters:
        patientNumberBookingRoomPanelField - : store the id of the Patient for whom the Examen has been registered
        accompanyingGroup - : store the selection result of a JRadioButton group with boolean type
        LengthOfStaySelectionBox - : several values are available for the user to select
        entryDateField - : the user can choose the entry date from a pre determined range
        releaseDateField - : the minimum available release date is set to be the current date
        bedRoomNumberField - : store the number allocated for a specific room
        bookingGroup - : store the selection result of a JRadioButton group with boolean type

      • printRoomInList

        private static void printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Chambre> arrayRoom)
        this function is used to show only the booked Chambre information in the specific JList
        At the beginning of this function the bookedRoomList must be cleared A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom If the parameter examination of the Chambre is not null The Chambre is store in bookedRoomList Finally the Chambre stored in bookedRoomList are shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object
        arrayRoom - : used to store the Chambre object extracted from external file or updated by the user

      • printRoomInList

        public static void printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList list,
                                   Chambre room)
        this function is used to remove the booked Chambre from bookedRoomList
        A loop is used to check all the Chambre Object stored in arrayRoom When the specific Chambre object is found, it is removed from the bookedRoomList Finally the bookedRoomList updated is shown through the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object
        room - : a specific Chambre Object selected by the user

      • resetRoomDataToDefault

      • deleteDataFromExamination

        private static void deleteDataFromExamination()
        This function is used to reset to default the values of a specific Examen object A loop is used to check the parameter of each Examen object stored in temporaryListExamination If the Examen is found its bookingRoom value is update to false and the loop is broken
